title: For Sale: 1887 N175 Gypsy Queen Tug Arundel SGC 20
author: the-illini

posts.post_title: For Sale: 1887 N175 Gypsy Queen Tug Arundel SGC 20
posts.post_content:
Nice card of the Tugger. Looks much nicer than a 20, downgraded due to pencil erasing on the back. Bold image on this one. $1100 or best offer plus $4 shipping. PM or email me at [url]crb_972@yahoo.com[/url] with questions or to purchase.

Thanks

Chris
